alert.note: Alert for Concordia; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued February 17 at 3:43PM CST until February 17 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 20 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 PARISHES IN NORTHEAST LOUISIANA CONCORDIA TENSAS IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 18 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ATTALA CHOCTAW COPIAH HINDS HOLMES LEAKE MADISON RANKIN SCOTT SIMPSON YAZOO IN SOUTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI LAWRENCE LINCOLN IN SOUTHWEST MISSISSIPPI ADAMS CLAIBORNE FRANKLIN JEFFERSON IN WEST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI WARREN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ACKERMAN, BRANDON, BROOKHAVEN, BUDE, CANTON, CARTHAGE, CRYSTAL SPRINGS, DURANT, FAYETTE, FERRIDAY, FOREST, GOODMAN, HAZLEHURST, JACKSON, KOSCIUSKO, LEXINGTON, MADISON, MAGEE, MEADVILLE, MENDENHALL, MONTICELLO, MORTON, NATCHEZ, NEW HEBRON, NEWELLTON, PEARL, PICKENS, PORT GIBSON, RICHLAND, RIDGELAND, ROXIE, ST. JOSEPH, TCHULA, VICKSBURG, VIDALIA, WATERPROOF, WEIR, WESSON, WEST FERRIDAY, AND YAZOO CITY.
